bibl.title: Ostraca, Graffiti and Dipinti from Athribis in Upper Egypt - A Preview.
Acts of the Tenth International Congress of Demotic Studies. Leuven, 26-30 August 2008.

bibl.note: Preview on the finds of the joint German-Egyptian mission. - Ostraca from the temple area [demotic, Greek and Coptic]. - Dipinti and graffiti from the temple of Ptolemy XII [demotic, Greek and Coptic]. - Graffiti and dipinti from the so-called Asklepios temple [demotic and Greek].
bibl.seg: Sandra L. Lippert, Ostraca, Graffiti and Dipinti from Athribis in Upper Egypt - A Preview.

Mark Depauw & Yanne Broux (edd.), Acts of the Tenth International Congress of Demotic Studies. Leuven, 26-30 August 2008 = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 231 (Leuven - Paris - Walpole, MA, 2014) pp. 145-153, 1 fig.

Preview on the finds of the joint German-Egyptian mission. - Ostraca from the temple area [demotic, Greek and Coptic]. - Dipinti and graffiti from the temple of Ptolemy XII [demotic, Greek and Coptic]. - Graffiti and dipinti from the so-called Asklepios temple [demotic and Greek].
